nodes.text: Some time during 1 ABY, Rh'klin stole a crate of valuable equipment. A bounty hunter named Tearfin tracked Rh'klin, with the help of a transponder inside the stolen crate. Unfortunately, by the time Rh'klin arrived at a Tatooinian city, she realized she was being tracked. She immediately turned off the transponder and quickly blended in with a crowd of fellow smugglers.

Since Tearfin did not know what her mark looked like, she was not certain which of the smugglers was her mark. She interrogated Rh'klin, but could not determine whether she was innocent or guilty. A spacer eventually came along to help Tearfin. After interrogating all the smugglers, the spacer concluded that Rh'klin was in fact the thief that Tearfin was looking for.

Rh'klin is a Non-Player Character (NPC) in the MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies. She periodically spawns in random cities across Tatooine, along with Tearfin and the five other smugglers. Players taking part in the "Hero of Tatooine" quest-line must interrogate Rh'klin and the other smugglers, to determine which one is Tearfin's mark.
Due to the nature of the game, Rh'klin's appearance fluctuates, but she is always a female.
